item.title: 110 Surf Techniques 2
item.description: 110 Surfing Techniques Volume 2 is packed full of tips for high performance surfing. This comprehensive, easy to use coaching tool consists of 20 separate sections, where the action is split into Advanced Moves and Key Techniques. Advanced moves use detailed breakdowns of how to perform turns at the highest level; including forehand tube rides, snaps, off the tops, white-water climbs and how to adapt your bottom turn to suit the top turn. The Key Techniques section will help you to improve your overall surfing, demonstrating how to create your own board speed, master heavy drops, improve cutbacks, make fast waves, throw the tail out, improve take off, catch more waves, perform full rail carves and more. The DVD is split into 2 separate sections for regular and goofy stance, making it easier to relate them to your own surfing. Including slow motion and split screen to highlight correct techniques against common mistakes. Land, water and board cam angles are used to help explain the tips. Filmed on location in the England, France, South Pacific and Hawaii. Featuring high performance surfing from the likes of Pancho Sullivan, Taylor Knox and Josh Kerr. Including some incredible board cam footage of Ian Battrick in Indonesia.

item.title: The Stormrider Guide - Central America amp; The Caribbean
item.description: The Stormrider Surf Guide Central America and the Caribbean takes a journey through the wave-rich deserts, jungles and tropical islands sandwiched between North and South America. This region hosts some of the most fun and funky surf spots around, breaking in bath-warm water, immersed in a kaleidoscope of cultures and backdrops. Beautifully presented maps, photos and up-to- date, reliable surf information make this Stormrider Surf Guide a must have item for any trip to Central America and the Caribbean. Detailed Break Descriptions Handy maps Beginner ratings The surfers bible

item.title: The Stormrider Guide - Indo amp; The Indian Ocean
item.description: The Stormrider Surf Guide Indonesia amp; The Indian Ocean lifts the lid on what many believe are the best waves in the world. Cruise the exotic, swell- soaked shores of the Mentawais, Bali, Sri Lanka and the Maldives, then take a voyage of discovery around the isolated islands of the vast Indian Ocean. Stunning photos bring the waves to life and the crucial stats on swell, wind, tide and weather are just some of the reasons this indispensable surf guide should be top of the packing list. Detailed Break Descriptions Handy maps Beginner ratings The surfers bible

item.title: The Stormrider Guide - The World Vol. 3
item.description: Written by a collaboration of trailblazing journalists and local surf experts combined with awesome images from the worlds leading surf photographers. Detailed maps ensure easy navigation for expanding all surferamp;rsquo;s horizons. Detailed descriptions of each surf spot are enhanced by the unique Stormrider break symbols and supported by optimal swell and weather statistics, plus all the crucial travelling information. An overview of Meteorology and Oceanography and global Surf Environment and Culture looks at the past, present and future of surfing, right across the nine established chapters. The ultimate set of reference guides to our planetamp;rsquo;s surf. Detailed Break Descriptions Handy maps Beginner ratings The surfers bible 240 zones 612 pages

item.title: Nalu Beads Watergate Bay Glass Bead
item.description: The inspiration for NALU surf beads has been taken from the sea and it's ever changing moods and beauty from season to season. Maybe its in the shell we find strewn on the shoreline or in the many shades of turquoise we glimpse in the Atlantic breakers that tumble towards us. The thrill of being immersed in and at one with nature. What ever we do and wherever we may be Each one of our collectable lampwork beads has been designed and individually handmade using beautiful Effetre Murano glass. this glass is some of the most beautiful glass in the world, it has been manufactured on the island of Murano, Italy for centuries and is proven to hold its finish, lustre and colour with no special storage requirements. WATERGATE BAY - Home to many British championships Watergate is a reliable (even at high tide) and less crowded alternative to Fistral, for all abilities. Popular with long boarders, especially on small days. the sunsets aren't too shabby either!

Located a few miles south of the Cathedral City of Chichester, The Witterings has been a popular destination since Roman times. Then, as now, it enjoys a sheltered natural harbour, a sandy coastline, and - with much of this precious environment protected as an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty - stunning scenery, an abundance of birdlife and timeless tranquillity. With it's own microclimate, little wonder the area is known locally as 'God's Pocket'. There are a wide variety of sports and activities available, such as Sailing, Windsurfing, Golf, Kitesurfing, Cycling, Surfing and Horseriding. Or you could just enjoy the simple pleasures of Birdwatching, Fishing or Walking. In contrast, the villages of East amp; West Wittering, Bracklesham, West Itchenor amp; Birdham - together have a wide variety of shops, hostelries amp; places to eat.

SAUNTON - The vibe is mellow, the beach is huge. 3 miles of golden sands facing the Atlantic and backed by Britain's largest sand dune system known as the Burrows (The first Unesco biosphere reserve in the U.K). The shallow banks produce gently peeling waves, its longboarders paradise.

item.title: Nalu Beads Putsborough Gass Bead
item.description: Each one of our collectable lampwork beads has been designed and individually handmade using beautiful Effetre Murano glass. this glass is some of the most beautiful glass in the world, it has been manufactured on the island of Murano, Italy for centuries and is proven to hold its finish, lustre and colour with no special storage requirements. PUTSBOROUGH - Excellent for chillin' out and soul surfing. More mellow than Croyde, come here when the southerlys have blown out breaks to the south. Awesome on the right swell.

item.title: Nalu Beads Pebble Ridge Glass Bead
item.description: Each one of our collectable lampwork beads has been designed and individually handmade using beautiful Effetre Murano glass. this glass is some of the most beautiful glass in the world, it has been manufactured on the island of Murano, Italy for centuries and is proven to hold its finish, lustre and colour with no special storage requirements. PEBBLE RIDGE - (aka Westward Ho!) Nice begginners wave and good for a relaxing surf as you can avoid the crowds. Explore a little further along the footpaths and be rewarded with some nice little reefs that work well on high, neap tides.

item.title: Nalu Beads Oysters Glass Bead
item.description: Each one of our collectable lampwork beads has been designed and individually handmade using beautiful Effetre Murano glass. this glass is some of the most beautiful glass in the world, it has been manufactured on the island of Murano, Italy for centuries and is proven to hold its finish, lustre and colour with no special storage requirements. OYSTERS - Far off Downend at Croyde lurks the elusive Oysters reef. Needs the right conditions to work but when it does....break.

item.title: Nalu Beads Grunta
item.description: Each one of our collectable lampwork beads has been designed and individually handmade using beautiful Effetre Murano glass. this glass is some of the most beautiful glass in the world, it has been manufactured on the island of Murano, Italy for centuries and is proven to hold its finish, lustre and colour with no special storage requirements. GRUNTA - To the far Northern end of Woolacombe Bay and really only accessible by beach at Low tide, and by fairly steep cliff path at any other tide, Grunta offers limited space and access. Grunta could be seen as part of the point rather than a beach in it?s own right and should only be used by those willing to hike out via the steep cliff path, as it becomes cut off soon after low tide. There are no beach facilities. Beach is not patrolled.

item.title: Nalu Beads Croyde Glass Bead
item.description: Each one of our collectable lampwork beads has been designed and individually handmade using beautiful Effetre Murano glass. this glass is some of the most beautiful glass in the world, it has been manufactured on the island of Murano, Italy for centuries and is proven to hold its finish, lustre and colour with no special storage requirements. CROYDE - Devon's own surf central! Believed by some to be the best beach break in the UK/England. The banks here can produce powerful, hollow waves, best left to the experienced!

item.title: Nalu Beads Barricane Glass Bead
item.description: Each one of our collectable lampwork beads has been designed and individually handmade using beautiful Effetre Murano glass. this glass is some of the most beautiful glass in the world, it has been manufactured on the island of Murano, Italy for centuries and is proven to hold its finish, lustre and colour with no special storage requirements. BARRICANE - Northward of Woolacombe beach at low tide. It becomes cut off from it by a rocky headland at high tide. A beach break with short lefts and rights, but it's only really a low to mid tide break as there are rocks all over the place at high tide. Sheltered from northerly winds by high ground to the north. Not a beginner's wave.

WOOLACOMBE - One of North Devon's quot;hot spotsquot; with a great 2 mile stretch of beach with peaks along its length. The banks here work during different states of tide.

item.description: The Mentawai Islands are a chain of about seventy islands and islets off the western coast of Sumatra in Indonesia. Siberut (4,030 kmsup2;) is the largest of the islands. The other major islands are Sipura, North Pagai (Pagai Utara) and South Pagai (Pagai Selatan). The islands lie approximately 150 km off the Sumatran coast, across the Mentawai Strait.

item.description: First released in '06, and was the best response we've ever had for a new Shortboard model. This year's version features our latest fine tuned rocker and bottom contours and that classic SD3 outline. Built with a vee deck to boxy, yet sensitive rail. The rocker is long and straight through the middle with accentuated kick in the nose and tail allowing it to carry through flats, fit in tight pockets, and lay on a rail. This board has become our all around War Horse of a Shortboard. Shaped by Bulkley while he was here in the uk and finished by Diplock. item.title: Lost 6'2 Bulkley Round Nose Fish Surfboard
item.description: The worldamp;rsquo;s all-time best selling fish model. During the filming of 5'5quot; REDUX, the RNF and RNF Quad were updated and fine tuned. The nose has gotten wider again, and more conservative overall rocker and less concave make for a board that will hold speed in flats and produce harder, longer carves. A longer, less pronounced vee in the tail gives a more predictable feel out of turns, and a straighter outline adds drive and hold. The deep wing, influenced by MR's vintage twin fins, adds more control of high speeds and better bite in snaps and out of carves. It still paddles great, still makes you look good, but the updates allow harder, more powerful carving turns and a wider range of performance in more varied surf. Shaped by Bulkley while he was here in the uk and finished by Diplock. Built by US lost shaper Bulkley 6'2 x 20.75 x 2.5 LOKBOX System

item.title: Lost 5'11 Bulkley Whiplash Surfboard
item.description: Built for precision, tight radius, high speed, spontaneous surfing. The mindset behind this board was anything not needed, take out. Low volume rails, vee deck, elliptical outline (No hip or bump in the tail) with narrower nose and tail block combined with an aggressive rail rocker and deep concaves to keep it moving make this the most sensitive and responsive board we offer. Not recommended for below average surfers, but for the guy who wants to elevate his performance to the highest level. This board performs best in the pocket of curvy waves of any size. Shaped by Bulkley while he was here in the uk and finished by Diplock. Built by US lost shaper Bulkley 5'11 x 18.25 x 2.18 FCS Fin System

item.title: The Surfing Manual Advance
item.description: For the first time ever, the quot;Who's Whoquot; of surfing divulge their secrets, in one book, a future best-seller. For the first time ever, many of the world's top surfers have been assembled to create the most definitive skills and coaching manual for the sport of surfing.quot;Surfing: The Manualquot; has step-by-step photographic sequences with intuitive training captions, covering every manoeuvre in surfing. The chapters are peppered with expert tips and insight from over fifty of the sport's icons, such as Andy Irons, Laird Hamilton, Mike Parsons and Tom Carroll. The book has several hundred full colour photographs by the top surf photographers, to illustrate each move, or just inspire you.The book flows from ocean knowledge and wave understanding, to equipment choice, survival and etiquette, before getting to the heart of the matter; take-offs, bottom turns, tube riding, tricks, arials and every manoeuvre you could imagine. The final sections deal with such subjects as how to turn professional, and how to win contests or ride extra large waves.What makes it unique is the sheer number of professionals who have taken the time to give away their insightful secrets and tips, for the first time ever.

item.description: A comfortable earplug that won't affect your balance while taking part in any water based action sports. A totally European design, the Sorky has already been awarded a SIMA (Surf Industry Manufacturers Association) Innovation award. Sorky stands for innovation in Basque. item.title: Fusion British Surf DVD
item.description: Fusion is a film about surfing around the beautiful, diverse and wave-rich coastline of Great Britain, featuring the country's best surfers at the best spots when they're at their best, from the beach breaks of Cornwall to the heaving slabs of Caithness. If you appreciate good surfing and can relate to the extremes that make the British surf scene truly unique then you'll certainly enjoy this film. quot;Mind-blowing surfing, sick waves and stunning scenery. This film captures British surfing at it's very bestquot; - Oli Adams. quot;This video is full of amazing footage from the widest variety of waves on our British coasts. Great surfing with new cutting-edge music...What more do you want?quot; - Ben Skinner. quot;It got me buzzing about home and feeling proud to be a British surfer. Why travel abroad?quot; - Mark Harris quot;It's like cold water Indo, you just need patience and a thick wetsuit. Ross has captured the moment, so watch this film and go live the dreamquot; - Richie Sills.

The added bonus of a swallow tail is it's ease in turning and added ability to pick up waves. This allows the board to give you outstanding performance in critical waves. For the intermediate surfer and above. 6'2quot; x 18 1/2quot; x 2 1/4quot; FCS Fin System Thruster Fin Set Up Good Wave Board British Made.

item.title: JP 5ft 10quot; SX Shortboard
item.description: John 'JP' Purten have recently been crowned Carve Magazine's best shortboard shaper. These boards range from 5'4quot; to 6'2quot;. This board is specifically designed for the guys who are competent with their performance surfing and are looking for a board that will perform in the smaller, less powerful waves. This board incorporates a fuller plan shape similar to the hybrid. It also incorporates performance board characteristics like concaves and rail shapes, but with a more relaxed rocker and a different bottom contour in the front third of the board. This allows the board to catch waves easily and respond to acute turns making the board feel narrower than what it actually is whilst maintaining full speed. 5'10quot; x 19quot; x 2 1/4quot; FCS Fin System Thruster Fin Set Up British Made.

item.title: JP 5ft 10quot; RX Shortboard
item.description: John 'JP' Purten have recently been crowned Carve Magazine's best shortboard shaper. Great for the heavier surfer who struggles in these waves. Where some will useFish / longer boards, this board has the same concept as the SX model but has a wider plan shape more akin to the original 80's thruster.It also has a bump wing allowing a more parallel plan/rail line which gives more projection also giving it a pivot point to give better rail to rail transition with the full plan shape. Fin positions have been adjusted accordingly to maintain the performance aspect. 5' 10 quot; x 20 1/2quot; x 2 1/2quot; FCS Fin System Thruster Fin Set Up British Made.

item.title: Aloha 5 ft 9 Bean Five Fin Performance Fish Surfboard
item.description: The BEAN transfers the performance of a standard shortboard into a more compact design thatamp;rsquo;s incredibly fast and responsive in small-to-medium size waves. Low entry rocker further enhances speed while moderate rocker through the tail provides maneuverability in tight sections. The BEAN retains the thickness and foil of a performance shortboard and combines a shallow single-to-double concave with vee through the tail making it frisk, lively and a ton of fun. 5'9 x 19 1/2 x 2 5/16 Quad or Thruster set up Low entry rocker Single to double concave.

item.title: Quiver 6 ft 2 Hobbit Surfboard

item.title: Firewire 6 ft 0 FST Sweet Potato Quad Surfboard
item.description: The Firewire Sweet Potato is the surfboard that is half the size of a longboard but catches as many waves, even when its small mush. Everyone that has surfed these boards has loved it in all conditions. The Sweet Potato is such an easy board to surf. It puts the fun back into surfing, from tiny ripples to head high surf! The rapid response flex memory in the Future Shapes Technology used in these boards yields great speed through the turns whilst the parabolic rail configuration guarantees 100 return memory for years. Firewire surfboards feature are leaps and bounds ahead when it comes to construction. The parabolic balsa rails flex at the start of a turn storing energy and rebound through the turn releasing built up energy in the form of speed. The spring back of the parabolic rails to the original rocker triggers rapid acceleration, like an arrow shot from a bow. The construction materials, a unique formulation of hi-tech epoxy resins and advanced composites mean that these boards maintain the lively feel you get with brand new polyurethane boards, but are up to 20 lighter and will last 5+ times longer. This manufacturing process has won environmental awards and has created a range of lightweight and durable custom boards that are quickly being recognised for their awesome performance, just ask Taj Burrow! 6'0 x 23 x 3 Parabolic balsa rails dual density EPS and advanced composite core Quad set up FCS Fins

item.title: Wave Finder Surf Guide Mexico
item.description: Written by former Transworld Surf journalist and seasoned Mexico traveller David Small, Wavefinder Mexico offers a complete surf guide to one of the best surf destinations on the planet. With more than 300 individual surf spots backed up by our unique Surfer's Eye maps, Wavefinder Mexico delivers all you'll need to know about Mexican surf spots into a neat pocket-sized guide book. Our aim is that wherever you find yourself in Mexico, and whatever the conditions, you will easily be able to find a quality spot nearby. Pocket Size 300 Individual spots Ideal Stocking Filler

item.title: Wave Finder Surf Guide Indonesia
item.description: Written by 2 time Pipeline Master Larry Blair, Wavefinder Indonesia offers a complete surf guide to one of the world's most popular surf destinations. With more than 200 individual surf spots backed up by our unique Surfer's Eye maps, Wavefinder Indonesia packs all you'll need to know about Indo surf spots into a neat pocket-sized guide book. From the dangerous, almost unmakeable waves at Panaitan Island, through the pure natural-foot perfection of Lagundri Bay, to the ocean-going adventure off the Mentawais, the dense jungle lifestyle of Grajagan, volcanic power at Canggu, madness and fun at Halfway Kuta, impossibly long lines at Impossibles, shallow green reef barrels at Padang, mellow high tide at Geger, the 'waiting game' at Desert Point and Sumbawa's crowded Lakey Peak. Pocket size 200 Surf Spots Ideal stocking filler

item.title: Wave Finder Surf Guide Central America
item.description: Covering surf spots in Guatemala, El Salvador, Nicaragua, Costa Rica and Panama. Written by former Surfer magazine journalist Terry Gibson, Wavefinder Central America offers a complete surf guide to five of the best surfing destinations on the planet. With more than 170 individual surf spots backed up by our unique Surfer's Eye maps, Wavefinder Central America delivers all you'll need to know about surf spots throughout this amazing area into a neat pocket-sized guide book. There are powerful, quality, warm-water waves from the Mexican border in the north all the way down to southern Panama. Includes Tulate, Champerico, El Zunzal, El Zonte, La Bocana, Mizata, Punta Roca, Punta Mango, Las Flores, Puerto Sandino, La Jamaicana, Playa Sardinas, Playa Gigante, Witches Rock, Boca Barranca, Playa Escondida, Pavones, Playa Venao, Playa Santa Catalina and many more. Wavefinder Central America lists the key swell, tide and wind data on more surf spots in the region than any other surf guide. Pocket Size 170 Individual spots Ideal Stocking Filler

item.description: The most comprehensive surf guide available for the USA amp; Hawaii, covering over 1,000 individual surf spots backed up by our unique Surfer's Eye maps. item.title: Patagonia Mens R3 Front Zip 3mm Winter Wetsuit
item.description: Wittering surf shop is one of the only stores in the country stocking the all new Patagonia wetsuits. We know how cold it can get in the winter and the need for ultimate stretch as well as comfort. All the staff have tested these suits out in the depth of winter. The Patagonia R3 has merino lining that gives our wetsuits their added warmth without added rubber. But our patented merino wool grid is just one part of the successful equation. The neoprene we use has a high-density nitrogen cell structure for maximum warmth and durability, the post consumer recycled polyester jersey increases durability while minimizing environmental impact, and the quality craftsmanship and attention to little details ensures a great performing, well-made wetsuit. Patagonia wetsuits are decidedly warmer than standard nylon-lined suits. But thatamp;rsquo;s not all. They also wear longer, dry faster and are more environmentally conscious than other suits. The R3 is made from 3mm neoprene, but due to its construction, it is as warm, if not warmer, than a standard 5/3mm winter steamer. Dual neck gasket construction (internal and external) keeps water out Overlapped front yoke for easy on/off Chlorine-free merino wool grid lining for superior warmth Seams which are single-needle blind-stitched on the outside using nylon-bonded thread and triple glued for extra durability and strength; crotch seams are internally taped Bar tacks (clean-finished and reinforced with a polyurethane tab) reinforce wrist and ankle seams in high stress areas Anatomically engineered, PVC-free kneepads are flexible and durable 3mm neoprene - but as warm if not warmer than a standard 5/3mm winter steamer

item.title: Firewire Deviant Future Fin
item.description: The Firewire Deviant Future Fin. Moves between 6 amp; 9 degrees, increasing speed through turns amp; drawing tighter arcs than standard fins. The Deviant Fin, developed by Radcor Design Studio amp; Firewire, applies that same principle to the rear thruster fin. The Deviant automatically adjusts 7deg; of cant in either direction (14 degrees total range of movement) and noticeably increases speed amp; responsiveness by reducing rail-to-rail drag, amp; shortening the turn radius: your board will feel faster amp; looser. Throughout our testing we felt the benefits of the automatically canted rear fin immediately! The design is based on a neutral template for the first release which is very close to a FCS M5 or a Futures FEA outline. The Deviant Fin is a single rear fin suitable for a thrusters fin set up. Construction - Ultra Light composite Base - 111mm (approx) Depth - 115mm(approx) Area - 9525mm(approx) Sweep - 33 degrees(approx) Colour - Black

item.title: Firewire 6 ft 4 Dominator RapidFire Diamond Tail 5 Fin Surfboard
item.description: The Dominator is a very versatile board. The Dominator combines a full outline with a thick foil from nose to tail and a 5/4/3 fin configuration(use as a 4 fin quad or 3 fin thruster). The wide point has been moved back to reduce the nose profile, maintaining all of the speed but with none of the top turn drawbacks of retro nose outlines. Built with the flex characteristics and light weight of Future Shapes Technology, the Dominator paddles like it's turbo charged and does not track like heavier PU boards with similar dimensions. Take Charge! The rapid response flex memory in the Future Shapes Technology used in these boards yields great speed through the turns whilst the parabolic rail configuration guarantees 100 return memory for years. Firewire won the SURFBOARD OF THE YEAR award at the recent SIMA awards - that's basically the surf industry deciding who has done the best job, and is an extremely prestigious award. 6'4quot; x 21 x 2 3/4 parabolic balsa rails EPS and advanced composite core 5 Fin set up FCS Fin System

item.title: Wave Tribe Eco Cork Tail Pad
item.description: In the 1600sa Benedictine monk named Dom Perignon observed that wooden stoppers wrapped in oil-soaked rags used to seal his bottles of sparkling wine often popped out, and so he replaced them with the conical pieces of cork to seal his bottles of sparkling wine. Wave Tribe once again releases the World's First Eco Deck Pad. Most deck pads are made out of non environmentally friendly EVA plastic (Ethylene Vinyl Acetate). We first tested recycled EVA pads but they didn't hold up well---they were a bit soft and didn't quite offer the right consistency. After trying several different alternatives they came across CORK and after making and testing a cork + eva composite their research and development team were very pleased with the results and you will be too. Cork Oaks live about 150 to 250 years. Virgin cork (or 'male' cork) is the first cork cut from generally 25 year old trees. Another 9 to 12 years is required for the second harvest, and a tree can be harvested twelve times in its lifetime. Cork amp; EVA Three Piece Design No ToxicPaints Strong Bull Glue L 12quot; x W 11quot; / back 5quot; Arch height 3/8 :: Kick 1 1/4quot;

item.title: Quiver 5'10 Bumble Bart Surfboard
item.description: The Bumble Bart: Forward wide point with a stub nose and pulled in round pin tail means you get the rail feel of a good wave board but with the stability and paddle power of a fish. Deep single to double through the fins with slight vee off the tail gives you concentrated speed through the fins with great hold on deep bottom turns and carves. Medium rocker throughout with the shortened all round template means it sits in the pocket all day whether its upside down or the wrong way round!!
